text: Doug Miles is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1970s. He played at club level for Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 806), as a , i.e. number 2 or 5.Mike Rylance (22 August 2013). "Trinity: A History of the Wakefield Rugby League Football Club 1872-2013". League Publications Ltd. ==Playing career== ===Club career=== Doug Miles made his début for Wakefield Trinity during October 1974, and he played his last match for Wakefield Trinity during the 1974–75 season. ==References== ==External links== *Search for "Miles" at rugbyleagueproject.org Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Rugby league wingers Category:Rugby league players Category:Wakefield Trinity players
title: Doug Miles
